{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20706v1", "title": "Every 2-connected, cubic, planar graph with faces of size at most 6 is
  Hamiltonian", "summary": "We prove that every 2-connected, cubic, planar graph with faces of size at
most 6 is Hamiltonian, and show that the 6-face condition is tight. Our results
push the connectivity condition of the Barnette-Goodey conjecture to the
weakest possible.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-04-29T12:36:38Z"}
